channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Drain blocked causing flooding, 20th October
item.description:
Hello the drain outside number 2 is blocked. I have reported this time and time again. Still the same issue. I was told a few years ago there is a problem much further down the pipe when someone put a camera down there. The issue still hasnâ€™t been fixed down the line. The flooding is getting worse. I have kept it free of mud and leaves. Needs to be investigated fully instead just clearing the mud and the problem continuing. I would this looked into. Our house nearly got flooded when we had heavy rain a few weeks back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Liddington Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fallen tree, 20th October
item.description:
I am attaching a photo of a tree (half a tree) that has fallen onto the footpath to the tennis courts opposite the entrance to Cherston Court, Barnwood. It is on the north side of Barnwood Road. If your workers can't find it please ask for more directions.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 201, Barnwood Road, Barnwood, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Completely blocked, 20th October
item.description:
///moral.sideboard.turntable On the pedestrian crossing. It has been blocked for over 6 months now, all the other drains on the road have been cleared recently, but not this one that is completely blocked. When there is a flash flood, because this drain is blocked, the runoff runs straight down our drive and floods the garage. The electrics were damaged last time. We would really appreciate this not happening again next time a storm comes. It is storm season.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shurdington Road, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
